0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '16' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/Ax-LED/ioBroker.powerfox2/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.0.6 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/Ax-LED/ioBroker.powerfox2/blob/master/package.json)
